info.author: Donovan Baarda
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Pysync has both a demonstration implementation of the rsync and related 
algorithms in pure Python, and a high speed librsync Python extension. The pure 
Python is not fast and is not optimized, however it does work and provides a 
simple implementation of the algorithm for reference and experimentation. It 
includes a combination of ideas taken from librsync, xdelta, and rsync. The 
librsync Python extension is less flexible and harder to understand, but is very 
fast.
info.name: pysync
info.summary: A Python implementation of the rsync algorithm
info.html_description: Pysync has both a demonstration implementation of the rsync and related algorithms in pure Python, and a high speed librsync Python extension. The pure Python is not fast and is not optimized, however it does work and provides a simple implementation of the algorithm for reference and experimentation. It includes a combination of ideas taken from librsync, xdelta, and rsync. The librsync Python extension is less flexible and harder to understand, but is very fast.
